name: space3C
description:
The year is 3300. The Machines have taken over. Mankind is on the brink of extinction. You are one of the last surviving Engineers, sent on missions by the Human Resistance. Will you outsmart the Machines and give mankind a chance to take back control?

Avoid getting noticed by the Sentinels. Build Healing Stations to replace the Machines and heal your wounds. Sneak deeper into this post apocalyptic world. Gather components, key to the Human Resistance fight against the Machines. Save mankind, armed with nothing but intelligence and dexterity.
